General.Name: Hwacom Systems
General.Description: HwaCom Systems Inc., a broadband system integrator, supplies information communication technology, intelligence services, and information security applications in Taiwan and internationally. The company also supplies multimedia applications. Its product portfolio includes network management solutions; new energy solutions; intelligent transportation service; ISMS and PIMS services; telecommunication digital value-added application services; smart community value+, a smart community app; AIoT applications; digital transformation assist services; smart city solutions; AI Cyber Security Defense- Darktrace; IT/OT asset discovery, vulnerability management, threat detection, and smart street light solutions, as well as 5G network and smart application solutions, broadband intelligent solutions; cloud computing and data center solutions; AR/VR applications in the manufacturing and industrial fields; and drone application solutions. The company also offers millimeter wave Radar smart detection solutions; smart exhibition and 5G streaming solutions; system vulnerability scan services; IPTV/OTT solutions; source code inspection services; webpage vulnerability scan services; and breach and attack simulation solutions, as well as security management services, and digital risk protection solutions. HwaCom Systems Inc. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 98, Hsin-Tai-Wu Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
